name: Send emails via Brevo to FormCrafts form responders
description:
Every time a new form is submitted in FormCrafts, an email will be sent to the responder via Brevo.

The template expects your form to have at least the following fields:
1. First Name
2. Last Name
3. Email

The template uses this [sample form](https://formcrafts.com/a/mrvcsfa).
